title: panca ghOSAtItanai
sahitya:
panca ghOSAtItanai nenjAra ninaippadE bhakti sAdhanam arivAi manamE


anupallavi

  vanjaminri mamatai konjamum inriyE anju pulan vazhiyE alaiyAdu nilai ninrE


caraNam    kalaiyurai pala mada karpanaigaLum vENDAm kaTTuk-kathai valaiyirp-paTTu muzhikka vENDAm
pala pala ulagirkkum paraman oruvanaiyE pAruLLE nErAgap-pUraNa jyOti Om
